rs row as the first row of armhole shaping over 32 sts sl m work row 1 of cross chart b over 5 sts sl row 1 rs decrease work in patt to 7 sts rem including any m k1 p1 2 times k2 required raglan shaping sl next st remove marker return slipped st to left needle k2tog p1 k1 2 times k1 1 notes work side edge stitch beginning of rs row end of neck st decrease d ws row in stockinette and slip and b row 3 work in patt to last 6 sts sl m k1 p1 2 times k2 work row 2 4 once then repeat row 1 4 thereafter for row 4 repeat row 2 repeat prev 4 row 1 1 2 4 4 5 4 5 time s more 2 2 3 center chart work row 2 38 once then repeat row 1 38 5 5 6 5
